description: ECMAScript module configuring ESLint with Next.js specific configurations using @eslint/eslintrc's FlatCompat for extending base configurations.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: File path of the current module derived from import.meta.url

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Directory path of the current module

methods.name: compat
methods.description: Instance of FlatCompat used to extend ESLint configurations

methods.name: eslintConfig
methods.description: Array of ESLint configuration presets extended from Next.js recommended configs
